summary: Adds a super overpowered weapon to the game. Does not replace any weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Description
____________________
Adds a super overpowered weapon to the game (15000 damage). The weapon is craftable at any forges. The weapon can be found under the Daedric section inside a forge. It has the same textures of a daedric sword (sadly). New updates are going to come. Thank you and have fun. Oh yeah and has a super fast attacking speed. Spam your buttons..

Installation
___________________
Nexus Mod Manager
1) Click download with NMM

Manual Installation
1) Download the file.
2) Extract the file
3) Copy/Move the file to your Skyrim/Data directory

Known Bugs
______________
- When trying to craft the weapon in the forge, weapon's damage might be shown as 150. But actually is 15000. In one of the photos, there is an example.

Visit this website for game reviews
_____________________________________
http://blackrapgames.host-ed.me/

See my youtube website
